page.title: 14HOMES IN 1985 (continued)
page.content: {HOMES IN 1985 (cont) {FURNISHINGS-}To decorate rooms people use wallpaper there are lots of different patterns.There is also plain wallpaper and another wallpaper called chip wood which it is possible to paint over. Most people have curtains.Some have blinds at the windows.Curtains are sometimes operated by string but mostly by hand.Curtains also have patterns and have the same variety as wallpaper.Blinds are mostly plastic or made from material, operated by two strings when one is pulled it opens or closes. Today most floors are covered by patt- erned carpet.Mostly in kitchens there is lino on the floor.
